meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a shaman.
meanings.sent1: The shamanic rituals were deeply spiritual.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace had shamanic symbols engraved on it.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to have a shamanic ability to predict rain.
meanings.sent4: The old tree exuded a shamanic presence in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The shamanic chants echoed through the valley, invoking ancient spirits.

meanings.definition: Involving practices or beliefs associated with shamanism.
meanings.sent1: The tribe performed shamanic healing ceremonies.
meanings.sent2: She delved into the study of shamanic traditions.
meanings.sent3: The shamanic drumming session was both calming and energizing.
meanings.sent4: His artwork was inspired by shamanic visions.
meanings.sent5: The shamanic journey took her to realms beyond imagination.
